t: Amazon.com: 100 Assorted Pokemon Trading Cards. : Toys & Games
s: Customers are pleased with the condition of these trading cards, noting they look brand new and are crisp and clean. They appreciate the variety, with one customer highlighting the good mix of Basic and Stage 1 cards, and find them to be a great value with several high-value cards included.
